titleStmt.title: Index des lieux de l'édition numérique' "Berliner Intellektuelle 1800-1830"
Index of places of the Digital Edition "Berliner Intellektuelle 1800-1830"

seriesStmt.title: Briefe und Texte aus dem intellektuellen Berlin um 1800

revisionDesc.change: Deleted double entry l0958 (was double to l0395). Added new entries l0958 and l1181.
Added entry l0208 (new). Added entry l1119 to l1123.
Updated entry l0152 and added entries l1089 to l1091.
Updated entry l0231 addes entry l1068.
Added entries l0995 (for Carolin) to l0997.
Added idno type="geonames" for all entries using a self-written script. Warning: The idnos were determined automatically and are unverified!
Added idno type="geonames" for a number of entries (just testing for the correspDesc beacon, not stable).
Added greek name in entry l0426.
Added entries l0964 to l0976 for Marion.
Added entries l0855 to l0871, corrected entry l0228.
Added entry l0777, changed all when attributs to when-iso.
Added entries l0241 and l0768 to l0769.
Added entries l0150 to l0153. Attributed a new value to l0102.
Added entries l0148 to l0149. Deleted double entry for 'Ulm' (l0102).
Changed file name, some minor changes.
Added entries l0078 to l0080 and small changes.
Reworked architecture and added places from letters 01 to 04 von Buch an Beausobre (up to entry 0032).
Added places. General architecture still need to be revised, xml:id attribution not working. Need to add the french version of the names in case they are evoked in the corpus.
